SOURCE CODE 


0001 function show_intermediate_curves_on_image(input_image,tokens,color)
0002 if nargin==2,
0003     color = 'r';
0004 end
0005 if ~isempty(input_image),
0006     imshow(input_image)
0007 end
0008 lines = tokens.lines;
0009 nlines = length(lines);
0010 for k_ind = 1:nlines,
0011     hold on,
0012     [crd_x,crd_y,energy,width]  = PSzz_raw_information(tokens,k_ind);
0013     plot(crd_x(2:end-1),crd_y(2:end-1),color,'linewidth',2);
0014     hold on,
0015     scatter(crd_x(1),crd_y(1),16,'k','filled');
0016     hold on,
0017     scatter(crd_x(end),crd_y(end),16,'k','filled');
0018 end
